info.title: Smart Parking System API
info.description:
# Smart Parking System API

ğŸ‰ **Production-Ready Smart Parking Management System with IoT Integration**

## System Overview
Complete parking management solution with real-time IoT monitoring, subscription-based access control, and comprehensive payment integration.

### Key Features:
- ğŸ—ï¸ **Hierarchical Data Management**: User â†’ ParkingLot â†’ Floor â†’ ParkingSlot â† Node (IoT Sensor)
- ğŸ” **Role-based Access Control**: Super Admin, Admin, and User roles with subscription-based limits
- ğŸ“Š **Flexible Subscription Plans**: Node-based pricing with Basic, Professional, and Enterprise tiers
- ğŸŒ **LoRa IoT Integration**: Real-time parking status via ChirpStack MQTT
- ğŸ’³ **Payment Gateway**: Cashfree integration with support for web and mobile apps
- ğŸ“ˆ **Analytics & Monitoring**: Historical data, real-time status, and health checks

### Test Data Available:
Test data is pre-seeded for immediate testing. Use `npm run seed:test-data` to reset.

**Test Credentials:**
- Super Admin: `superadmin@test.com` / `Test@1234`
- Admin (Professional Plan): `admin@test.com` / `Test@1234`
- User (Basic Plan): `user@test.com` / `Test@1234`
- Unverified User: `unverified@test.com` / `Test@1234`

### Subscription Plans:
- **Basic**: $19.99/mo + $2/node (â‚¹1,659 + â‚¹166/node)
  - 2 lots, 50 slots, 2 gateways, Email support
- **Professional** â­: $49.99/mo + $2/node (â‚¹4,149 + â‚¹166/node)
  - 5 lots, 200 slots, 5 gateways, Analytics, API access, Priority support
- **Enterprise**: $149.99/mo + $1.50/node (â‚¹12,449 + â‚¹124.50/node)
  - Unlimited resources, 24/7 premium support, Custom features

### Architecture:
**Data Flow**: ChirpStack â†’ MQTT (HiveMQ) â†’ Node â†’ ParkingSlot â†’ Real-time Status
**Hierarchy**: Nodes connect directly to parking slots; gateway info from MQTT metadata
**MQTT Integration**: Dynamic topic subscription based on Application IDs stored in ParkingLot table
**Real-time Updates**: Status changes propagate immediately (<1s) from sensor to database

### Endpoint Categories:
- **Authentication**: Login, registration, OTP verification, password reset
- **Parking Management**: Lots, floors, slots with full CRUD operations
- **IoT Devices**: Gateway and node management with LoRa integration
- **Subscriptions**: Plan management, subscription status, payment processing
- **Analytics**: Status logs, historical data, real-time monitoring
- **System**: Health checks, API documentation

**Complete API documentation with examples and test data. All endpoints require JWT authentication unless specified.**

chirpstackApplicationId.description: ChirpStack Application ID for MQTT topic subscription

description.example: Ultrasonic sensor for parking slot A-001

distance.description: Distance reading from sensor in cm

gateway.description: Gateway information from ChirpStack data, not direct relationship

description.example: Ultrasonic sensor for parking slot A-001

parkingSlotId.description: UUID of the parking slot this node will monitor

distance.description: Distance reading from sensor in cm

NodeUpdateStatusRequest.description: At least one status field must be provided

id.description: Unique identifier for the subscription plan

features.description: List of features included in the plan

perNode.description: Price per node per month in USD
Price per node per year in USD

maxParkingLots.description: Maximum number of parking lots allowed

maxParkingSlots.description: Maximum number of parking slots allowed

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

example.error: Email must be a valid email address

message.example: User created successfully. OTP sent for verification.

400.description: Validation error or user already exists

post.summary: Resend OTP for verification or password reset

get.summary: Get user profile with subscription status

400.description: Validation failure or incorrect current password

post.summary: Recover unverified account by regenerating OTP

200.description: Account recovered and new OTP sent

400.description: Account not found or already verified

Get all floors for a parking lot

post.summary: Update node status via ChirpStack webhook
Update gateway status via ChirpStack webhook

post.summary: Link gateway to admin account (Admin only)

400.description: Gateway already linked or invalid ID

parameters.name: gatewayId
parameters.description: Specific gateway ID to get statistics for

post.summary: Create a new gateway (Super Admin only)

description.example: Primary gateway for main building parking

get.summary: Get gateway by ID with nodes (Super Admin only)

post.summary: Unlink gateway from admin account (Admin only)

404.description: Gateway not found or not linked to this admin

get.description: Returns the basic health status of the API and its dependencies
Returns detailed health information including environment and configuration
Checks if the service is ready to serve traffic
Checks if the service is alive and should not be restarted
Returns a simple pong response for basic connectivity testing

get.summary: Get all nodes for the authenticated admin with pagination and filtering
get.description: Returns nodes owned by the current admin with their parking slot relationships, real-time status, pagination support, and optional filtering by slot ID

parameters.name: slotId
parameters.description: Filter nodes by specific parking slot ID

200.description: List of nodes with status information and pagination metadata

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: UUID of the node to retrieve

put.description: Update node information including name, description, ChirpStack Device ID, location, and parking slot assignment

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: UUID of the node to update

description.example: Updated ultrasonic sensor for parking slot A-001

parkingSlotId.description: UUID of the parking slot to assign this node to

schema.description: All fields are optional. Only provided fields will be updated.

400.description: Validation error or ChirpStack Device ID already exists

404.description: Node or parking slot not found

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: UUID of the node to delete

get.description: Get all nodes that are not assigned to any parking slot. Supports pagination and optional gateway filtering.

post.summary: Get nodes by parking slot IDs
post.description: Retrieve nodes associated with specific parking slot IDs. Useful for getting sensor data for multiple slots at once.

slotIds.description: Array of parking slot UUIDs to get nodes for

get.description: Retrieve all parking lots, floors, slots, and nodes with real-time status for the authenticated admin
Retrieve detailed information about a specific parking slot including historical data

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of historical records to retrieve

put.description: Manually update sensor node data for testing or maintenance purposes

get.description: Retrieve real-time statistics for the parking management dashboard

post.description: Receive ChirpStack uplink data via webhook (backup to MQTT)

get.summary: Get all parking lots for the authenticated admin

400.description: Cannot delete parking lot with existing floors/gateways

post.summary: Assign a gateway to a parking lot
post.description: Associates a LoRa gateway with a specific parking lot. The gateway must be owned by the requesting admin and not already assigned to another parking lot.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the parking lot to assign the gateway to

gatewayId.description: UUID of the gateway to assign to the parking lot

200.description: Gateway assigned to parking lot successfully

message.example: Gateway assigned to parking lot successfully

400.description: Validation error or gateway already assigned

already_assigned.value: Gateway is already assigned to another parking lot

invalid_uuid.value: Invalid UUID format for id parameter

404.description: Parking lot or gateway not found or access denied

parking_lot_not_found.value: Parking lot not found or access denied

gateway_not_found.value: Gateway not found or not linked to your account

message.example: Failed to assign gateway to parking lot

404.description: Parking lot or gateway not found

get.summary: Get all gateways assigned to a parking lot
get.description: Retrieves all gateways that are currently assigned to the specified parking lot. Only returns gateways owned by the authenticated admin.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the parking lot to get gateways for

message.example: Invalid UUID format for id parameter

404.description: Parking lot not found or access denied

Get realtime parking slot status from MQTT cache

400.description: Cannot delete parking slot with assigned node

404.description: Parking slot or node not found

get.summary: Get parking slot status and history

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recent status logs to return

post.summary: Quick assign node to parking slot using ChirpStack Device ID
post.description: Assign a node to a parking slot using the ChirpStack Device ID from QR code scanning. Critical for mobile app workflow.

slotId.description: UUID of parking slot (from QR code)

400.description: Validation error or node/slot already assigned

nodeAlreadyAssigned.value: Node already assigned to slot X

400.description: Invalid input or user already has subscription

get.summary: Get user's subscription status with detailed information
Check subscription limits for a resource

get.summary: Get payment details by transaction ID

get.description: Retrieve all subscription plans. Non-authenticated users see only active plans, admins see all based on filters.

id.description: UUID of the created subscription plan

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific subscription plan

put.description: Update an existing subscription plan (Super Admin only)

delete.description: Soft delete a subscription plan (Super Admin only)

Update multiple subscription plans at once (Super Admin only)

put.description: Update the exchange rate for all subscription plans (Super Admin only)

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics about subscription plans (Admin only)
